name: Clean Vision Duty in: Silent Hitman Stick-Man Sniper Kills Jet-Pack Assassin Rifle Shooter
name_original: Clean Vision Duty in: Silent Hitman Stick-Man Sniper Kills Jet-Pack Assassin Rifle Shooter
description:

Oh no!

Crazy Jetpack Stickman Terrorists have taken over the city! Camp on the metropolitan rooftops and take them all out in this action-packed sniper arcade game!
